artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: four men and one woman standing in a row; men wear top hats, vests, jackets and ties; woman wears a long dress, long black gloves, a hat and a feathered boa; columns and banner behind figures; text and top and bottom: "24. COLECCION DE CANCIONES / MODERNAS / PARA / LOS LAGARTIJOS. / EDITOR / A. VANECAS ARROYO. / MEXICO."
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: Los Lagartijos (The Dandies), plate 15 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
